content.parText:
El Taco RiendoCecily's favorite. Get the Pastor off the spit.2412 Central Ave NE, Minneapolis, MN 55418

Holy LandIf it's good enough for Guy Fieri, it's good enough for you.2513 Central Ave NE, Minneapolis, MN 55418

Hai HaiFusion Thai street food with great cocktails and brunch.2121 University Ave NE, Minneapolis, MN 55418

Young JoniTrendiest restaurant in the neighborhood. Great pizza. Be sure to check out the speak easy in the back.165 13th Ave NE, Minneapolis, MN 55413

World Street KitchenA must-go food stop for people who dare travel to Uptown.2743 Lyndale Ave. S Minneapolis, MN 55408

Moose on MonroeThe bar where it all began. Pull tabs, karaoke, cheap drinks, and Price is Right on weekdays.356 Monroe St NE, Minneapolis, MN 55413

Dangerous Man Brewing CompanyLocal craft brewery with good beer and plenty of suburbanites. Try the peanut butter porter!1300 NE 2nd St, Minneapolis, MN 55413

Norseman DistilleryOur favorite craft cocktail bar. Great tacos from the foodtruck out back.451 Taft St NE, Minneapolis, MN 55413

Grumpy's NortheastLocal dive bar with a great juke box.2200 4th St NE, Minneapolis, MN 55418

Aster CafeGreat place for a cocktail out by the river.125 SE Main St. Minneapolis, MN 55414

Stone Arch Bridge and Mill City District Top Instagram spot in the cities. Bring your own selfie stick.100 Portland Ave, Minneapolis, MN 55401

Minnehaha FallsBeautiful park and waterfall. Check out some live music at Sea Salt nearby.4801 S Minnehaha Dr, Minneapolis, MN 55417

The Museum of Russian ArtA private collection of 20th century Soviet art in a former mission-style church.5500 Stevens Ave. Minneapolis, MN 55419

Minneapolis Chain of LakesRent a bike or canoe and do the lakes thing.Lake of the Isles, Bde Maka Ska, Cedar Lake

The Minneapolis GreenwayNearly six-mile trail that runs through the center of Minneapolis

Midtown Global MarketFun collection of diverse food options in the historic Sears building off Lake Street. Great stop if you're doing the Greenway.920 E Lake St. Minneapolis, MN 55407
